attributes.additional_details:
Open Air Comms looks to power and connect businesses across the country with superfast broadband. With your support we campaign directly to local governments and authorities for their support enabling us to role out super connectivity faster than any other UK ISP.
We understand that faster broadband connectivity propels business growth and in turn supports a growing economy.
We need your support to help more small to medium sized businesses get the connectivity they so desperately need.
